heading: Our Research Clinics
subheading: Specialized in-depth evaluation sessions for vehicles and prototypes

clinics.title: Car Clinic
clinics.description: In-depth automotive research sessions designed to evaluate consumer perceptions, preferences, and expectations regarding cars and prototypes.
features: Conducted with car owners, intenders, or switchers
Prototype testing with interior, exterior, and feature evaluations
Includes test drives and hands-on interactions (if applicable)
Assesses satisfaction, unmet needs, and emotional connections
Helps refine design, branding, and positioning before launch
Can be conducted across multiple cities and demographic segments

methodology.title: Our Approach
items: Combination of individual interviews and group evaluations
Structured rating systems for quantitative comparison
Eye-tracking and heat mapping for prototype testing
Emotional response measurement through facial coding

benefits.title: Client Benefits
items: Uncover unmet needs in the market
Optimize feature sets and trim levels

clinics.title: Bike Clinic
clinics.description: Specialized research sessions focused on motorcycle users to understand behavior, brand perception, and product expectations.
features: Interactive evaluations with current and potential users
Exploration of engine performance, comfort, and styling
Covers key influencers of buying decisions
Useful for testing mockups and early concepts
Includes individual interviews and group discussions
Ideal for fine-tuning features and pricing
